meanings.definition: The state of feeling ill or nauseous while traveling in a car.
meanings.sent1: Her carsickness made the road trip unbearable.
meanings.sent2: I always carry ginger candies to help with my carsickness.
meanings.sent3: Even the thought of carsickness makes me queasy.
meanings.sent4: His carsickness was a storm brewing in the backseat.
meanings.sent5: The intensity of her carsickness surprised everyone in the car.

meanings.definition: A feeling of discomfort or sickness experienced while riding in a car.
meanings.sent1: The medication helped alleviate her carsickness.
meanings.sent2: He tried to distract himself from the carsickness by looking out the window.
meanings.sent3: The carsickness seemed to play a cruel joke on her during the long drive.
meanings.sent4: The carsickness weighed on him like a heavy burden.
meanings.sent5: The carsickness lingered long after the journey had ended.
